Subjects: almsgiving; Edward VI; Edward IV; Edward V; patronage, pleas for
_description: John Hurleston, Prayer for alms, and for protection(?) of royal Edward — twelve fragmentary lines

HarEng1054.First Lines:
…great aduertence[ ] and geue ys almes[ ] and in their
                    presence[ ] haue their prayse…
HarEng1054.Last Lines:
…father full of mercie[ ]th euery thinge secrete[ ]
                    Edwarde the openlye[ ] the lif euerlastynge
HarEng1054.Note:
Added by hand of the sixteenth century to blank leaf at end of
                    Hardynge’s Chronicle, folio now partly torn away, with loss of
                    beginnings of lines.
